Class AI

java.lang.Object
  AI

public class AI
extends Object

class AI tries to think of good moves. Note: "Game" is the main class of the whole project, creating a board and an AI.

Version:
(2012 Feb 6) Gavin suggestion: that AI be an interface that can be implemented in various ways.
Author:
(Mike Roam)
